name: Friday Night Funkin: Sarvente's Mid-Fight Masses port optimized (KADE ENGINE)
name_original: Friday Night Funkin: Sarvente's Mid-Fight Masses port optimized (KADE ENGINE)
description:
finally, optimized for Chromebooks.

Mod: https://gamebanana.com/gamefiles/17646

Friday Night Funkin': https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin

Notes: the song replaces bopeebo, and the rest of the levels have been removed for performance.
IT IS STILL MISSING ZAVODILA

I can't port the new charts due to the mod creators not making a version without crossfades.

Version with normal Notes (NOT KADE ENGINE): https://sniper-gamingwastaken.itch.io/friday-night-funkin-sarventes-mid-fight-ma...

Version with normal Notes Kade engine: https://sniper-gamingwastaken.itch.io/friday-night-funkin-sarventes-mid-fight-ma...

ALT MODE REPLACES HARD MODE

you can play zavodila here: https://peppymods.itch.io/sarvente go thank Peppymods for this epic port.

changelog:

compressed other songs for faster load times since if you remove a file in this game it crashes.

fixed south background

fixed Sarvente's note up and right animations bugging out.

known issues: 

 Sarvente dark aninamtions likes to stop working lol

 Sarvente's voice cuts off a little bit near the middle-ish beginning

bopeebo's animation while playing the song lol.

gf and bf are still blurry (I REALLY need to fix that)
